LanguageData.PauseWalkerAbility.label: PauseWalker
LanguageData.PauseWalkerAbility.description: Pausing the flow of time around them, this entity acts freely while all else halts.
LanguageData.DropRoadRollerAbility.label: Road Roller-Da!
LanguageData.DropRoadRollerAbility.description: Drops a road roller from the sky to deliver devastating impact.
LanguageData.PauseWalker_ThrowKnife.label: Throw knife
LanguageData.PauseWalker_ThrowKnife.description: Throw a deadly knife at the target.
